Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Palette for cosmetics
Description: Extremely large palette for cosmetics, diamond-shaped with truncated extremities and slightly rounded. On the convex surface, green traces of the malachite ground on this palette are still visible. The concave surface preserves traces of a black powder, galena, which was also used a cosmetic by A-Group people.
